remarks: Division of both sides of a less than or equal to relation by a positive number.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
ltmul1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
lediv1d $p |- ( ph -> ( A <_ B <-> ( A / C ) <_ ( B / C ) ) ) $.
